name: Summer Sprint
description: Ride your bike across beautiful landscapes. Overcome obstacles. Help Lisa catch up with the thief.

name: The Camp
description: You have been sent to The Camp. You cannot leave unless you collect all tents. There are a lot of monsters, so be careful. If they touch you, you die.

name: RedRaptor
description: Blast off for a retro arcade experience in RedRaptor, a vertical shoot’em up inspired by genre classics of the ’90s!

name: Sleeping Dragon
description: Sleeping Dragon is an adventure puzzle game. In Sleeping Dragon, you need to explore small diorama levels, find 7 totems and unravel the mysteries behind the Sleeping Dragon's secrets. Sleeping Dragon is a 3D Platformer, full of puzzles and challenges and a lot of collectables.

name: Joy-N Help Me
description: JOY-N Help ME

name: Finding Anastasia
description: Finding Anastasia is a 3D first person horror game. You have to find missing girlfriend Anastasia.

name: Checkmate Challenge
description: A chess arcade game where you play against the strongest chess engine in the world.

name: The Great Hunt
description: Deep in the forest, far away from civilization, an evil awakens that no one can stop. As a forest ranger, you embark on a rescue mission that escalates into a terrifying nightmare. Defy your fears in this first-person survival horror game.

name: Off-Road Rides
description: Off-Road Rides is an exciting 3D driving game in which you have to drive a car of your choice and avoid obstacles on a construction side off-road scenery.

name: Love & Country
description: A World War I historical romance-spy thriller visual novel with meaningful choices.

name: Fishing Guy
description: This is a casual design game. In the game, players can catch a variety of fish with the cannon, including small fish, large sharks, and more. With beautiful graphics, realistic sound and innovative gameplay, it's a casual game for all ages.

name: Romance of a Demon Kingdom's Fall
description: In a fantasy world, play as a girl who rebelled against a group of demonic rulers, searching for all truths about the royal House, and about her heart.

name: Infinity Islets
description: A relaxing fantasy archeology sandbox. Dig through the sands of Infinity Islets to unearth hidden interdimensional artifacts. Your mission is to return these artifacts to the museum, bringing it back to its former glory.

name: Rust'N Ruin
description: Dive into 'Rust’N Ruin' an atmospheric 3D adventure in a post-apocalyptic steampunk world. Sneak and run through a world where all living creatures have turned against humans. Dodge monsters, and robots; find a way home. Be quick in danger and be clever with puzzles. Brace for boss epic battles.

name: The Inner Demons
description: The Inner Demons is the first game in a new genre of “Cinematically Cut Games”. Explore a horror environment through a cinematic lens in this innovative interactive experience.

name: The Temple Warrior: Battleground of Demons
description: Defeat the demons and save the prestigious Indian Temple in this FREE action-packed mini melee combat game.

name: Lord of Demons
description: Raid villages as Evil Lord by utilizing dark magic and your army of demons and undeads. Conquer the world, one island after the other, until everyone kneels before you.

name: Nacht-sama is quitting being the demon king!
description: Demon King Nacht's castle has been attacked! In order to find out who was behind the attack, Nacht used her ability to go back in time. After one investigation, Nahat found that things were not simple. She decided to slowly start building her prestige...

name: My Neighbour is a Bunny Demon
description: A Visual Novel thriller about surviving the machinations of a supernatural seductress. Entangled by a whirlwind romance, you find yourself thrust into a web of paranormal plots and perils.

name: My Lovey-Dovey Demon
description: A cute love story between a young man and an affectionate, adoring, utterly insatiable demon girl set in the Japanese countryside.

name: Clarity: The Seven Demons of Vanguardia
description: Clarity is a 2D side scrolling platforming adventure. Choose to face seven demons and acquire their demon sword and demon magic. Each sword and spell, has an elemental strength against a corresponding demon.

name: The Demons of Truth
description: The Demons of Truth is an action-adventure, open-world role-playing game set in an Ancient Time.

name: Kunoichi Demon Slayers
description: In the not-so-distant future, demons suddenly appear worldwide, leaving chaos and destruction in their wake. But amidst the despair, a group of ninja warriors emerges to defend humanity and vow to eradicate the demons.

name: Escape from Demon Island
description: In the lost island of Alcatraz, try hard to survive. You can use a variety of weapons and skills to avoid and eliminate wild beasts and monsters, and finally eliminate the abyssal demons and escape. Be careful, monsters are different during the day and at night! Enjoy yourself!

name: MareQuest: An Interactive Tail
description: A terrible darkness threatens a world of overwhelmingly adorable mares. Can a new cute mare with amnesia save the world or will she lose more than her memories along the way?

name: Democracy 4: Country Pack
description: Democracy 4 - Country pack adds six new countries to the game for you to govern:GreeceIrelandSwitzerlandPolandTurkeyBrazil

name: Red Antz
description: Put the ants on your body

name: Snow Blocks
description: Snow Blocks is an addictive 3D puzzle game where you have to break snow blocks! Your task is to destroy the blocks so that the ice blocks are on the ground! But be careful, there are other rules in the game!

name: Day Off Simulator
description: Unwind and have a blast in the "Day Off Simulator"! Give your boss a slap, relax with interactive musical instruments, and enjoy various leisure activities. A unique blend of excitement, relaxation, and creativity awaits you!

name: NodeLord
description: Build, automate and create - but most of all - survive!

name: Alchemy Deck
description: Alchemy Deck is an alchemy-themed card game that makes making potions fun. Take orders or create unique recipes. Collect and process ingredients and brew your potions. If you encounter threats, challenge them! Your goal is to find the philosopher's stone. Good luck!

name: Lighthouse Simulator
description: Stay at the lighthouse on this uninhabited island for ten days to win $100000, would you like to? You are alone, there is nothing to do, the only thing you have to do is to endure the isolation and loneliness, this may be a hell suffering, or a life of self-imposed exile

name: Rune Bender VR
description: Rune Bender is a fast-paced single player rogue-like VR Wave-Shooter in which players fight against monster waves from Slavic mythology to protect the shrine of the god “Veles” Draw runes to cast spells of different elements and shoot them wisely against "Perun" the mad god of thunder.

name: Mini Cars Puzzle
description: Mini Cars Puzzle is a 3D puzzle where you need to unload the parking lot occupied by cars and help each driver get out of the parking lot without harming other cars.

name: The Faceless Ones
description: Four of the most capable warriors in the Kingdom of Abrujah are about to commence a journey that will change their lives forever, if they fail, the world is doomed!

name: Echoes of Numa
description: Jessabel is the guardian of the next Vessel, Allegra. Responsible for training her, she'll soon find out that there is more to Allegra than she could have ever imagined. This 1 Vessel has the power to change everything. It's Jessabel's duty to make sure Allegra does well. For the sake of humankind.

name: Cash Cow DX
description: Holy cow, it’s all about the moooney! Run, jump and slide in this udderly moo-velous adventure to reclaim your fortunes from those sneaky Pig Pockets. Tough as nails and no continues! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Blue Sky Aces
description: A retro inspired, stylized world war 1 flight simulator that puts you in control of some of the worlds first war planes. Zoom above the trenches as you engage the enemy in fierce close range dogfights, where any moment could be your last.

name: Wicked Game
description: Wicked Game is a stunning VR action for the most ferocious players with full physics driven brawl and action-packed shooter. Use an interactive arena with lots of movement features and variety of weapons to prove you deserve to come out a winner

name: Blood Moon Horror
description: Blood Moon Horror is a 4-player, online co-op, psychological horror game with elements of puzzles.

name: Galaxy Commanders
description: Sin descripción

name: Drill to the Stars
description: In "Drill to the Stars," you build your OWN base! Guide enemies with walls into traps and eliminate them before they destroy your drill. Strategically adapt to the environment and place the towers cleverly for maximum attack speed in this roguelite tower defense game.

name: Hell Miner
description: Hell Miner is a casual indie game. Players play as a mining veteran, mistakenly into hell, encounter various demon girls, fight all the way to the bottom of hell, and finally become the king of hell.

name: Wasteland Elysium
description: Wasteland Elysium is a post-apocalypse action shooter with Rogue-like elements. Featuring Rowling, a highschool girl, on her journey in the wasteland. Players will be facing hordes of mutant creatures. Gather resources to obtain different power-ups, unlocks and survive long enough for an escape.

name: Restless Lands
description: Embark on an epic quest to save Midgard in "Restless Lands". Uncover ancient secrets, battle mythical creatures, and restore the magical garden of blue roses in this enthralling 2D pixel art metroidvania adventure. Magic, mythology, and mystery await!

name: Cosmic Resistance
description: Gear up, gamers! Brace yourself for an epic sci-fi strategy casual game where Aliens have swept across the cosmos, leaving humanity's fate hanging by a thread. The weight of liberation falls on your shoulders. Are you ready, General, to step up and become humanity's last hope?

name: Sand Sails: Pirate Legends
description: "Sand Sails: Pirate Legends" - embark on an exciting adventure! Join brave pirates, capture enemy vessels, and upgrade your fleet. Engage in sword fights or intense skirmishes. Beware sandworm monsters! Collect treasures and forge your path to fame and riches.

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 6
description: Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 6 - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 6 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Eternal Battle VR
description: VR Team-based Cross platform multiplayer game that is teeming with action, cooperation, and fun. Divided into multiple kingdoms, You and your allies will be conquering the Atlantis.

name: GhostBros
description: Ghost Brothers is a rogue-lite where you control a snake of multiple heroes, each with their own attacks, passive skills, and classes. Inspired by the auto-chess genre, each hero in Snake has a set of classes, and combining enough heroes of the same class can give you additional class bonuses.

name: Raicing
description: Mastermind the race in Raicing! Craft, train, and compete with AI drivers. Conquer rivals in thrilling multiplayer battles. Customize cars for the ultimate victory!

name: Umbra: Veins of Vengeance
description: The world has become a desolate wasteland, where boundaries between reality and nightmare have blurred, and madness is all there is to experience. Amon Morgan, a nefarious beast who enjoys the thrill of the hunt, is back. Be ready to experience a constant state of dread.

name: Mizeria
description: Nuoli finds herself stranded in a mystical land between life and death. With the use of her magical bow, and a unique platforming system, help her escape back to the land of the living, in this old-school inspired 3D Metroidvania.

name: Unrestricted Pest Control
description: U.P.C. is a top-down shooter where you play as a fearless exterminator to solve a small bug problem at a nuclear research facility. With the rogue-lite elements, you must choose your path to the upper floors carefully, while trying to bug fixing in the facility.

name: Rainbow Cream Saga
description: Welcome to Rainbow Cream Saga, a kickass melee action survival game with some RPG vibes! You can craft weapons, build bases, capture mounts and much more! Come through on this epic adventure and test out your survival skills.

name: Origami Lovers
description: Origami Lovers is a casual to midcore Jump'n'Run/Platformer set in a cardboard and paper world. Overcome obstacles and challenges while collecting different abilites that will help you navigate through the level.

name: Lindwyrm
description: Lindwyrm combines hack‘n‘slay combat, platforming, puzzling and housing in the shell of a rogue-lite action RPG. Crawl into thrilling dungeons, slay epic bosses with your weapon of choice, enhance your hero, and rebuild a destroyed village in this co-op adventure.

name: Wished on guilt
description: Aristocrat Evan Alford receives a mysterious invitation to the fair and comes to a small village on the outskirts of the country. The village seems strange and painfully familiar, but Evan has never been here. In addition, other guests of the fair are not as simple as it seems.

name: Dissent on Mars
description: A sci-fi life sim where you create new societies unlike anything on Earth. Design your economy and government, build your colony, and experience your choices firsthand by living as a colonist. Will your society become a living utopia, or another dystopia?

name: Nature & Wildlife: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 8
description: Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 8 - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 8 is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Ether Versus
description: A VR card battle game based on Chinese traditional mythology and the Spirit of Kung Fu. You will play different Champions in the story and weave their journeys. Build your sorcery deck, rein in your creatures, and use all your techniques to triumph over adversaries on your path.

name: Deep Maze
description: Experience the game from a top-down perspective that allows you to delve into the heart of the mountain range, measuring your progress against the speed. Now, let's see how far you can go. Let's find out!

name: Adventures of Squeak Bottoms
description: A rogue-like, RPG style game with tantalizing, comedic retro style gameplay. Face randomized level difficulty using procedural level design. Enjoy in-game economy to purchase upgrades and pets to help you on your journey to save your beloved pet from the evil clutches of Syhco Taiter!

name: Clash Cats
description: Stock up on epic hero powers to start the battle of the century today!Unlock your potential and new characters to battle competitors while exploring all the possibilities of this new and exciting action strategic tower defense game!

name: 304 Seconds
description: A short visual novel where you figure out Kuroya and Nicole's circumstances, and decide who gets to live, and who gets to die.

name: Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular
description: Plunge into a realm of spine-tingling delights, where ghoulish subgames beckon! Embrace frightful fun in the Super Spooky Subgame Spectacular!

name: The Crimson Pearl
description: The Blight has plagued The Kingdom for as long as one can remember. Ashanti and Scarlett believe they have found out a way to fight The Blight and defeat it once and for all. Their path to such solution will drastically change their lives!

name: The Solar Queen
description: The Solar Queen - an arcade disaster simulator. Your "professional" spaceship crew will break every part on board, get you into a thousand troubles, and make you learn high-flying stunts with just one engine.

name: Daughter of Crone
description: Take the role of a young witch named Eyfrid and master the ways of magic. Learn to cast spells, brew magical potions, and explore the mystical kingdom of Ervein. It is up to you to shape the destiny of Eyfrid, the Daughter of Crone.

name: Solivagant
description: You are a lone traveler, adrift in a realm beyond time and space. Navigate, decipher, and endure the enigmas of a world that defies understanding. Embark on a journey through the inexplicable in Solivagant. Heavily inspired by the Backrooms.

name: Let Them Fight
description: Hunt monsters, train them and send them to brutal fights in arenas.Join the league as one of many characters. Hire mercenaries, tamers, scouts and develop your own castle.

name: Mayhemers
description: Mayhemers is game where you can create chaos and mayhem in different type of places. Play solo or up to 4 people against AI or challenge with other players in 3v3 pvp game mode.

name: Jissou Land
description: Jissou Land is a simple clicker game that grow a cute little creature, 'Jissouseki'.

name: Ride 4: Bonus Pack 12
description: Download the Bonus Pack 12 and expand your gaming experience with 1 new exclusive bike and 5 events.

name: Hell Throne
description: A fast-paced action roguelite game with bullet hell elements, encounter based combat and high replayability. Make your way through monster infested realms as you pick and choose from a multitude of upgrades and abilities to create the meanest build possible!

name: Here We Exist
description: Here We Exist is a path that seeks for purpose and meaning, wander around a strange world where everything has a purpose, but nothing makes sense, talk with strange creatures, fullfil your destiny.

name: ReUpRise
description: Roll, defy gravity, save the station! ReUpRise is a thrilling adventure where you control a ball to fix a malfunctioning space station. Dodge obstacles, upgrade. Can you rescue the station in time? Roll into action now! Rising higher and higher up!

name: Dirt Bike Racer Simulator
description: Get realistic motorcycle experience on offroad terrains with Dirt Bike Racer Simulator! Complete quests, explore the open world, and enjoy the adrenaline-filled ride.

name: Controller King
description: Battle to be crowned the "Controller King" while you traverse through a kaleidoscope of vivid, mind-altering visuals while being ensnared by an auditory tapestry that will throb in your veins and ignite your soul

name: Orin
description: "Sorrow's Pursuit" follows Aelar, a valiant warrior in the enchanting world of Eldoria, whose life is shattered when the malevolent Shadow Serpents abduct his son, Caden. Driven by love and sorrow, Aelar embarks on a journey through treacherous landscapes and diverse tribes.

name: Lifelong
description: Lifelong is a first-person adventure game about the bureaucratic empire and the meaninglessness of certain jobs. You play as Marcel Dämlich, an employee of Scopesoft, a complex and labyrinthine company.

name: 2099 Gravity Havoc
description: Shoot at enemies in a WEIGHTLESS space station to save yourself from burning alive in the atmosphere!

name: Chickado
description: Chickado is an isometric rogue-lite game where you play as an armed chick who seeks revenge against the other animals on the farm by battling them.

name: Wisdom Watcher
description: Wisdom Watcher is a new VR shooter set in a clockpunk universe, find the right weapons to face the folkloric monsters inside the arenas and come out on top!

name: Ancient Viking
description: Ancient viking is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Destroy enemies on the location and complete the set goal to go further along the storyline.

name: KoroNeko
description: Relaxing puzzle game, roll your way in a Kawaii world full of Charming characters, a calming journey ahead of you to save your siblings from Strawberry the witch.

name: MiniDrift
description: Explore, Improve your skill and find the Tokyõ Drift Quest to show the world who you are in this Metroidvania mixes with a drift game.

name: Phantom's Call
description: You are trapped. Trapped in a morgue, unwillingly running tests with four beings looking to slaughter you. Equipped with your laptop and analysis tool, you must survive until the prototype test ends, precisely 6 minutes and 6 seconds. Good Luck.

name: HistoriCity: Florence
description: A historical, mission-based, stylized 3D citybuilder set in Renaissance Florence. Use the strength of your economy, the power of religion, and the beauty of classical art and architecture to rebuild a city decimated by the Black Plague and civil unrest.

name: MapleStory R: Evolution
description: A MapleStory mobile game.

name: World Class Leaderboard Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Martian Secrets
description: Martian Secrets is a 3D free-view meditation hidden object game where you have to fly around the map and look for the required items. But be careful, if you choose the wrong item, you will have to start all over again!

name: Paper Perjury
description:
Investigating a simple robbery reveals a tapestry of mysteries!

Solve a series of cases as newly hired police clerk Justina Smith and find out the truth behind a string of suspicious crimes. Work with the energetic detective Ernest Hunt and dig for clues in the paper trail to discover the secrets that paperwork can hide.

name: Yujiro's Mansion
description: As a thief who does his job well, you stumble across a mansion. What you didn't know was that this mansion belonged to the "Strongest Creature In The World", Yujiro Hanma. Can you rob Yujiro's Mansion and get out alive?

name: Super Real Basketball
description: The original version (relased in Japan and Europe) of the game released as Pat Riley Basketball in North America.

name: Starfire Skies
description: In this real-time, roguelike deckbuilder, you will use firework cards to create a visually stunning fireworks display. Collect cards and build your deck before each show for your specific audience and get the best rating possible, a 5 star show!

name: Million Depth
description: Embark on an adventure, exploring a million subterranean floors of a fallen Earth.Trace the remnants of humanity that once dwelled below, all in search of "YOU".Utilize a crafting system that transforms your drawings into weapons to survive the challenging underground world.

name: Micro Manager: 90 Days Probation
description: Live your life on your term in this modern coming of age work simulator. With various activities. The Manager doesn't like Slackers so watch out for his disappointment stance as he deducts points from your performance score.

name: NSG: Missing Tales
description: In this new adventure, the group discovers that Tales has disappeared and it is up to them to find him and arrive in time for the Halloween party. Here, time is your biggest enemy, or perhaps an ally? Your choices will make you closer or further away from finding it.

name: The Simplest Game in the World
description: You can beat this game with any key on your keyboard. ANY key, I mean it.

name: Adventure Tanks
description: Engage in fierce battles against rival tanks in a variety of arenas. Strategize your moves, dodge enemy fire, and reach the ultimate goal!

name: Eidolon Awakened
description: Eidolon Awakened is a turn-based creature collector RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world overtaken by creatures known as Eidolons. Take your place among the Summoners, able to capture and control the Eidolon to determine the fate of mankind.

name: Pixel Colony
description: Build and manage your own colony. Citizens are primary resource. Protect your settlement and colonists from hostile environment and make a prosperous city.

name: Midnight Acres
description: Experience Midnight Acres — an indie farming sim by day, and intense FPS by night. Unwind and battle on, all in one game as you grow and nurture your farm, plan and upgrade turrets and defenses, and engage in combat with horrifying beasts.

name: Icarus: Interior Decorations Pack
description: This pack unlocks 12 Mineral Lamps and 5 different art frames for players to craft.

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective 4
description: An intriguing and mysterious adventure in the detective world! Collect cryptic clues, examine intricate crime scenes, examine photos of suspects and immerse yourself in the fascinating atmosphere of a private investigation.

name: Desktop Basketball 2
description: Invigorating basketball everyone can enjoy together! Prepare for the next evolution in dunking!

name: Warf
description: Unleash strategic survival in Warf, where you guide Warf through relentless hordes. Shape paths, deploy towers, and engage in thrilling combat. Defend against the horde and emerge as the ultimate survivor in this innovative fusion of survival action and tower defense.

name: Dungeon Inn
description: The turn-based stategy management game giving the delightful tension. The Player opened an inn for two guilds with the dungeon just around the corner. Let's make a lot of money. The two guilds are hostile, but it's OK if they don't get caught!

name: No Man's Sky: Echoes
description: Meet a secret society of robotic aliens in update 4.4, ECHOES! Furthering the narrative introduced in INTERCEPTOR, explore the mysteries of the Autophage, perform their rituals, learn their language, and assemble your own ceremonial staff. In deep space, confront huge outlaw dreadnoughts, sweep through their trenches and destroy vulnerable components in new tactical space combat – and much more!

name: Frog Bridge Scape
description: You guide our friend Frog across temporary bridges and collect batteries to reach the portal. The bridges are activated with your electric gun on the coils.

name: Edge of War
description: Edge of War delivers an isometric, turn-based CRPG where the world reacts to you. All side quests are main quests, as every decision matters and impacts the fate of the Northlands. Explore and complete missions, but keep your heroes on their toes: the wilds do not forgive.

name: Hell is Others: Good Neighbor Pack
description: An extra pack of juice for the good neighbors of Century City

name: Horn Sounds
description: Your task is to destroy all enemies on the map. Farms will provide you with provisions, with which you can hire new soldiers. Gather squads, hire new soldiers, capture farms... All this will help you win!

name: Blocklords
description: Blocklords is a player-driven grand strategy game by MetaKing Studios. Rule, conquer, and grow with your medieval Hero.

name: Soul War
description:
Soul war is a real-time strategy card game set in a dark fantasy universe.
Each card played materializes on the arena and fights for you.

name: Death Crown: Immortal Edition
description: Embrace the definitive experience of the minimalist real-time strategy game that has captivated players with its 1bit style and engaging gameplay. Immortal Edition is an all-in-one package that delivers the complete journey of Death's battle against humanity's Kingdom and more.

name: Zubash
description:
Zubash is a physics action game blending "cooperation x battle". Experience unique gameplay, strategies of betrayal, and physics-driven miraculous plays. It's a user-friendly game perfect for fun times with friends and family.
Note: Supports local multiplayer only.

name: Number One Fighter
description: Select your fighter, choose your level, be the last one standing and K.O your opponent. Will you be the number one fighter?

name: Tommy Gun Witches
description: A whodunit with witches point and click adventure

name: BoxFight
description: Made for fans of retro arcade games and newcomers alike, BoxFight is a fast-paced shooter game in which you must weave between the waves of enemies that come your way by rotating around the playing field, shooting them as you go in order to survive as long as possible inside of The Box!

name: Bounce on Back
description: Jump back into the action with the sequel to the critically acclaimed Bounce On 2! Bounce On Back puts you in control of Bounce - a red, rubber ball - as he tries to rid Apricot Smiles Day Care Center of a terrible evil. Roll, jump, and bounce to fight against Voodoo, a doll of great magical power that steals happiness from the children. Collect giggles to weaken his power and progress through the world.

name: My Mine
description: So, you're a gold digger? Collect jewels in your own mine!

name: Ball O
description:
Ball O is a fresh and unique physical collision game.
Classic LCD minimalistic style with wood and metal sound.
Ball O only need one tap to play.It is easy to learn, hard to master.Shooting balls is easy, find good angle is hard.Maybe need some luck too.

name: Shadow of the Orient
description: Ready to do battle with evil and save the day? Shadow of the Orient is a 2d pixel art action adventure platformer game with fully customizable touch controls, fluid movement and smooth animations. Explore vast levels filled with secrets, quests and loot. Fight your way through hordes of samurai enemies and mythological creatures using your Dao sword or fight off enemies at a distance with ranged weapons.

name: Pizza Hero
description:
Welcome to Pizza Hero, the exciting new shoot 'em up roguelite that puts a delicious twist on the genre! In this game, you'll play as a brave pizza who must defend the world from an invasion of enemies.
As you battle your way through the game, you'll have the opportunity to choose from a variety of different toppings that will grant you special abilities. For example, selecting pepperoni will give you a grenade, allowing you to deal splash damage. Or, if you're feeling saucy, you can choose blue cheese to create a pungent parameter around your pizza, damaging any foes that come too close.

name: Overmortal
description:
Martial world, so easy! Here in Overmortal, an eastern fantasy wuxia idle role-playing game, you can enjoy an easy and auto-grinding journey of ascension.
As a mortal new to the world of ascension, you can practice Magicka and Corporia for ascension to immortality through tribulations, or go on expeditions around the world to make friends and unravel mysteries.

name: Witch Cram Sorceries
description: Play as Marietta, a new magic teacher, as she tries to guide and teach the new kids to become master of their magic.

name: Mini Star Survivor
description: Collect stars and use them wisely to become stronger. Use each character's personality to establish a growth strategy. And survive and escape for 5 or 10 days.

name: Triplets Trouble!!!
description: Triplets Trouble!!! is a visual novel slice of life about a father and his triplets in a period shortly after the pandemic. Each game played by the children became a mini-game, in a short narrative over seven days in the life of this family.

name: Falls and Jumps
description: Falls and Jumps is an endless 2D platform game about where you need to stay alive by jumping on platforms that appear for a short time and avoiding deadly traps. Your task is to hold out as long as possible.

name: Cyberpunk 2
description: A sequel to Cyberpunk 2077 planned as the next major Cyberpunk project after the release of Phantom Liberty.

name: Poly Backrooms
description: Welcome to Poly Backrooms, an unique multiplayer co-op horror game that combines the infamous backrooms creepypasta with a fun, low-poly aesthetic. With up to 4 players, you and your friends will navigate through the backrooms, solving intricate puzzles and avoiding dangerous entities.

name: Zombie Battlefield Survivors
description: Zombie Battlefield Survivors is a top-down view roguelike action shooter game. Fight against hordes of zombies, constantly upgrading attributes and collecting credits to enhance your character's abilities.

name: Horror Gallery
description: Immerse yourself in a sinister narrative as you piece together the story through hints in this eerie place. Every step you take inches you closer to the truth.Will you uncover the chilling truth?

name: Dungeon of Horror
description: Dungeon of Horror - a 2D-pixel dungeon labyrinth, where you play as a girl trying to find the way out and discover all the dark corners of this frightening place. Watch your steps, avoid traps, collect all loot and escape the dungeon!

name: The Flat
description: The Flat is an FPS Immersive Horror where you're just a small cog in the vast, dark machinery of Corpo Corporation. Navigate corporate chaos, fight for your life, master unique stealth mechanics, and immerse yourself in a brutalist horror setting. How much can you take before you snap?

name: Idle Stellar
description: Embark on an epic adventure through the cosmos in Idle Stellar. Gather, trade, craft, upgrade your spaceship and fight enemies. Whether you play actively or look for a relaxed idle experience, the journey ahead is rich in features and content!

name: The White Prison
description: The White Prison is a tragic and thrilling story about the confrontation of indigenous peoples, the impending civilization, told through the prism of a survival simulator. Take the role of polar aviation pilots who made an emergency landing in the Siberian taiga and try to survive.

name: Jrago The Demon Hunter
description: Jrago The Demon Hunter is a METROIDVANIA style 2D Platforming Action-Adventure Role Playing Game. The world is overcome in darkness, and you are a hunter named Jrago on a quest to slay the demons and bring back the light!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Onikakushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Watanagashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original second chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Tatarigoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original third chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Free for All
description: What is most important to you? Money? Honor? Love? Or any other things? It's all good. Please enjoy this adventure according to your values.

name: Grozs Fantasy World
description: "Grozs Fantasy World"A side-scrolling action adventure game where players take on the role of adventurers traversing various fantasy-themed worlds.

name: Sufficiency
description: Sufficiency is a 3D first person room escape puzzle game with unique puzzle solve system and artstyle. Players have to figure out the usage of each item/facility on their own, and solve all the puzzles based on their understanding.

name: Idle Crypto Capitalist
description: Idle Crypto Capitalist! Buy the best cryptocurrencies on the market and earn more and more money with smart investment strategy. Now you can be a millionaire through crypto investment while idle!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Someutsushi-hen
description: An extra arc and the first in the Advanced Story saga, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, developed for Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna Volume I: Tatari.

name: Hot And Lovely: Uniform
description: Hot And Lovely: Uniform is a classic puzzle game. Players need to eliminate more than three blocks of the same type to complete the goal and pass the level. After completing all the levels, the game is successful!

name: Rock Scissor Paper
description: Rock Scissor Paper is a casual Minigames that you can Compete with the multiple characters, win the compete to promote your relationship......

name: Mik
description: Mik is a story based & fast-paced first person jump & run game in which you explore a detailed & interactable abandoned facility. Run on walls, jump over cliffs and find out about the past of Revelo Robotics.

name: Strategic Command: World War I - Empires in Turmoil
description: Our Empires in Turmoil DLC adds six exciting new campaigns to Strategic Command World War I.

name: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3
description: Little Kingdoms: Chapters 1-3 is a prologue to Little Kingdoms, a medieval real-time strategy game with stylistic low poly graphics and relaxing music. Your goal is to conquer the neighboring kingdoms and grow your empire.

name: Miniature Mayhem!
description: In Miniature Mayhem, mad scientist Victor's experiment goes awry with a rogue gamma ray. Chaos ensues as the Mayhem Miniatures are born. Wreak havoc and compete against friends in hazardous environments filled with power-ups and weapons!

name: Polygon Race
description: Polygon Race is an arcade car game with minimalist graphics. Your task is not touching the cones, get to the finish line or collect the flags for a certain time. Be careful not to crash the car.

name: Through Time the Girl Puzzle
description: "Gentleman puzzle, relying on puzzle skills and skills to keep moving into the hearts of various beautiful girls! "

name: Thanks, Light.
description: [Thanks, Light.] is a first-person 3D geometry puzzle game where you shine and absorb light to transform 2D and 3D states.Watch as one boy saves a world that has lost its light.

name: Unread Messages
description: Unread Messages is a retro-inspired cyberpunk puzzle game where you deliver texts by making connections between cell towers. Alongside your Ai companion, FASMA, solve confounding levels and uncover the secrets hidden within Simullect Inc's computers.

name: L-Room
description: Let's build the routes that connect the platforms. This is a first-person puzzle game where you have to understand the algorithm and select the correct nodes.Think carefully with a drone as a companion.

name: Technocide
description: Technocide is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up with a heavy emphasis on player weapons and abilities. You must not let enemies past you and reach your mothership! You will need quick tactical thinking as you weigh your weapons' strengths and weaknesses against your enemies and their positioning.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Amusements
description: Puzzles of amusements!

name: Forgotten Roads
description: Forgotten Roads - a game, where you can immerse yourself in an off-road road adventure. Drive through beautiful locations, muddy roads, and other obstacles that will stand in your way! Transport the cargo with extreme caution otherwise you will have to start all over again!

name: Fatrifice 2
description: The demoness Shar, summoned by a group of girls who performed a fatrifice, wants to become even stronger! And how will she do that, you ask? That's a good question, by another fatrifice!

name: Battletoads
description: Battletoads are here to fight aliens form other words. Get into the battle with the most baddest toads on the planet! These toads are here to kick some rear end and chew gum...and they are all out of chewing gum. The aliens are attempting to invade the planet and all that stands in their way are these mutant toads. Battle aliens through intense and challenging levels. Shoot the invaders as quick as you can.

name: Knightess
description: Anastasia, Artemisia & Lozen, three mercenaries who roam the Kingdom' looking for work, are seen by the King as the possible solution to keep the peace, even if only temporally. Join the three of them, as they journey in what will become a path of discovery, friendship and betrayal.

name: Pocoman: Green Machine Level Pack
description: To all PocoManiacs around the world, in space, on the sea bottoms, and working mining contracts in the asteroid belt; Our new add-on PocoMan level-pack is ready!

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 8
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Fun With the Fitzgeralds
description: Welcome to the Battle of the Fitzgerald's there can be only one King or Queen of the land, so join in on the funniest battle you will ever play. It's all just about the FUN.

name: SkySouls
description: Third Person Action and Adventure Game in the style of D.Souls. fantasy world where kings and magical creatures collide in an epic showdown. In the realm of SkySouls, peace is threatened by the evil Demon King Ossur, who opens a portal to hell unleashing destruction.

name: Toufra
description: Toufra is a challenging speedrunning game. Your only companion is your trustworthy grapple to manipulate in air. Take on this challenge throughout multiple immersive levels set in dark enviroment.

name: Collectamon
description: Collectamon is a creature collecting game with an additional focus on upgrades. Upgrade your character, upgrade the area and place your caught monsters in your sanctuary. Catch all monsters in the game? Upgrade Everything? Try and get all achievements? It's up to you!

name: Deep Nest
description: Deep Nest is a fast-paced single player action shooter roguelite where you play a space marine fighting off an endless horde of alien monsters in an infested facility.

name: Veil of Clay
description: A woman magically appears in Clay's home and he is swept into an adventure that forces him to come to terms with his selfish behavior, or be a coward and not face his weaknesses. Clay comes to question the essence of love, companionship, and who he is going to be.

name: Creatures by Candlelight
description: Become a professional hunter of monstrous enigmatic creatures through an anthology of hunts that mix cards and "choose your own adventure" style gameplay. Amidst a dark and smothering world; grab a light, strike out, and fight against the odds. It's all just another day (or night) on the job.

name: The Projection Room of Malka Spitzer
description: The Projection Room of Malka Spitzer is an atmospheric, psychological RPG adventure that delves into the depths of the mind. Unravel the enigmatic maze of dreams, confront inner demons, and challenge your perception of reality.

name: Cooking Crew
description: Join forces online with friends or go solo in this immersive restaurant simulator! Transform an empty restaurant into a bustling hotspot, upgrade your kitchen and serve a variety of delicious dishes. Can you handle the heat and satisfy every hungry customer?

name: Hot Candy Land
description: A 9 to 5 desk job is not really your thing? Go grab your smart phone, start filming and get ready to fulfil your destiny as the King of the Adult Industry in this crazy classic tycoon parody!

name: Memento Dawn
description: A colorful puzzle game that follows a lost child on a journey to search for her memories and helps her through the darkness by controlling light and shadow.

name: Legends of Elementia
description: Legends of Elementia: A magical open-world metroidvania game with elemental combos and map interactions! Switch between heroes, defeat enemies with unique powers, and restore Elementia's balance. Unleash powerful elemental combos and explore a dynamic world with interactive maps.

name: Toree Saturn
description: Toree Saturn is a speed based 3D Platformer featuring a round bird with sunglasses and a backpack!

name: Small Kingdoms
description: Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up cities and armies on the world map and command troops on the battlefield. Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with small procedurally generated world maps, and campaigns you can complete in a weekend

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Himatsubushi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the original fifth chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Meakashi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the first arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Ball Out
description: Link 7 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. provides souls in balls for the player to rebirth. The research log indicates that the physical properties of the disc may not be completely inert.

name: Specimen #08
description: The untitled eighth game in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. takes place in an unknown, blood-soaked location. The only new detail given on the research log is an ultrasound image of an unknown figure.

name: Wolvesville
description: Wolvesville is a multiplayer game for up to 16 players. Each game has different teams such as villagers or werewolves all fighting to be the last team standing. Use special abilities to uncover the roles of other players and convince your fellow players to work with you.

name: Max Twist
description: In this futuristic Xtreme Sport, players mount hover boards and spiral down a tube in space full of obstacles. Smoke speed records and set new max twists to a heart-pumping soundtrack. Inspired by games like 1080° Snowboarding, Max Twist takes the concept to the space age.

name: Labyrinth of Rage
description: Enter the Labyrinth... at your own demise.

name: Shadows on the Walls
description: Shadows on the Walls is an immersive VR game of psychological horror, exploration and puzzles that takes place in the Crystal Palace Museum of London. Put yourself in the shoes of a security guard in charge of watching the new and mysterious exhibit of the museum known as the “Cursed Loot”.

name: Surviving Skeleton Island
description: Surviving Skeleton Island is a challenging survival RPG set in a vast 3D low poly island world of 12 unique biomes. Explore, hunt, craft, build, farm and fish to survive, while quests and clues unveil the secrets of the island, and your past. Forge your destiny and plot your escape!

name: The Grugs: Origins
description: The Grugs: Origins is a creative mix between runner and platformer games, mixing the challenging elements of both into it's gameplay, while allowing for player expression with four playable characters with multiple available skills to use.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Alternative Hirukowashi-hen
description: An alternative version of Hirukowashi-hen originally included in Higurashi When They Cry Kai, which contains several changes, namely the addition and removal of certain characters and the removal of references to plot details not yet revealed in the Kizuna series.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Kageboushi-hen
description: An extra arc and the third in the Advanced Story saga, partially adapted from the manga-exclusive arc Onisarashi, developed for Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna Volume II: Sou.

name: Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster
description:
Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster will use Nightdive Studio’s proprietary KEX engine, support up to 4K resolution at 120FPS, feature modern gamepad support, remastered cutscenes, and add trophies and achievements to the original game experience.

Players assume the role of Kyle Katarn, a mercenary hired by the Rebel Alliance to discover and destroy the Galactic Empire’s Dark Trooper project, a clandestine military operation created to develop Force-sensitive stormtroopers and battle droids. Star Wars: Dark Forces features several memorable locations from the original trilogy, including the interior of a Star Destroyer and Jabba the Hutt’s desert yacht, as well as new locations unique to the game.

Star Wars: Dark Forces has enjoyed a sizable cult following in the decades since its original release, having been added to the Steam storefront back in 2009 and even being partially canonized in official Star Wars lore with the introduction of the Dark Troopers in the second season of The Mandalorian.

name: Swell
description: Link #9 of Haunted PS1'S C.H.A.I.N. initially resembles a PSX disc, but is revealed in the research log to be some form of potentially living creature. What follows is only explainable on those terms.

name: Ancient Origins: Flying Fish
description: Fred is Trying to see how far he can fly. Jump on pearls to stay in the air...But don't belly flop, or it's game over!

name: Morikomori Life
description:
Morikomori Life is a social and simulation game featuring Ghibli-style artwork, with a core experience that is based on farming and social relationships. The main character, Kaon, receives a secret letter from her grandmother, which leads her back to her childhood hometown of Komori, a quiet village far from the hustle and bustle of the city, where she experiences a healing life.

The Japanese-style paradise-like village is depicted using 3D toon shading to reproduce realistic textures, bringing the animated world to life. The village is filled with pleasant Japanese landscapes, where players enjoy fishing, farming, housing, and other activities.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Tsumihoroboshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the second arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Wonder Wheel
description: This is a wad of 4 maps; they are vaguely nature-themed and about 10 minutes and 100 monsters long each. No gameplay changes. Balanced for pistol starts.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Minagoroshi-hen
description: A port of the remade version of the third arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Mothership
description: This is a single map set on a UFO. Works only in Eternity 4.00.00 or higher.

name: Beware of Falling Angels
description:
This is an Eternity Engine map with portals and some special effects.
The gameplay is classic: no new monsters or weapons, no jumping. Freelook is not needed or recommended.

name: Bifrost
description: Single map based on the idea of rainbow bridges.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Yoigoshi-hen
description: An extra arc based on the manga arc of the same name and features several changes, namely the addition of a new character Miyuki Sorimachi.
Short, if a bit tricky, map with nothing but neon skyscrapers, transparent platforms and setpiece fights.

name: Enigma of Sector Sigma
description: 5-map wad. Pistol starts are the intended experience, but continuous playthroughs are supported too.

name: Bourgeois Megawad
description: Bourgeois Megawad, also known as Bourgeois Deathmatch, is a 30-map vanilla and Unity compatible megawad created in 2021 by Decay, Adam Post (Doomkid), and Razgriz. All of the maps are playable in singleplayer, co-op and deathmatch.

name: Ichinichi
description:
This is my second 32-map solo project (remember KINDa.wad?)!
The gameplay is completely vanilla, using limit-removing ports and contains only stock textures and music. The majority of maps are small to medium sized with differing themes and pace.

name: Crusader
description: Crusader is a 10 map singleplayer levelset for DOOM2 using OTEX and DSDHACKED, featuring a new arsenal of weapons and some new enemies. The recommended port for Crusader is DSDA-Doom - many features will not function without a port that supports DSDHACKED.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Tokihogushi-hen
description: An extra arc and third in the Advanced Story saga that centers on Tomoe Minai investigating a murder case with ties to Rena Ryuugu.

name: Lost Civilization 2
description: 7 maps with ending scene and a secret map.The gameplay is mainly exploration with small fights here and there. More shooting in the end. You can solve some puzzles or not, those are mostly optional. Gameplay is easygoing. Nothing for Doom-veterans (easy). Has a little scarier moments to spice things up.

name: 12 pm Break
description: Get ready to take your lunch break on Toonie Tuesday. Sometimes lunch breaks are longer, so this time it’s not going to be limited to 5 maps.

name: Lunacy
description: Lunacy is a wild journey to the moon and back! Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping Series welcomes back our hero from Mapping at Warpspeed, Zorglo Blaskowicz IX, on another Skillsaw-inspired quest to defeat the enemy aliens encroaching on the cheese production facilities of Luna, and to ingest as much dairy as possible.

name: Hovercab Station
description: A bit of a spiritual successor to my 2022 wad, Herschel Spaceport. Blast your way through demons from Hell in a rundown city block. The action takes place up top on the streets, in a (hover!) train station, and in the water filtration system below.

name: Herschel Spaceport
description: Here's a short techbase map set in Herschel Crater, on Saturn's moon, Mimas. The UAC has set up a space colony overrun by demons. What could the UAC have hidden under the Miman soil to warrant such an invasion?

name: Tyrant
description: 5-map wad, Egyptian-themed. Pistol-starts are recommended, but not necessary.

name: Never
description: NEVER uses mostly vanilla assets to create an atmosphere that I think you'll find unique and oppressive (but in a fun way). There is some old-school DEHACKED nonsense to keep it fresh.

name: Doomkid's Mega!
description: A set of 8 classic style Doom II levels. There's some minor DeHackEd use and a few custom sprites, but nothing too crazy.

name: Jamal Jones: In Judgment of Evil
description: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Jamal Jones: One Man Jury!
description: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Jamal Jones: Hell's Executioner
description: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Organ of Eden
description: The tenth entry within Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is preceded by a report of a parasitic mind virus and a biostratigraphic diagram. A medical team surrounds the player as gore begins to pile around them.

name: Day 11
description: The 11th link in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. is extremely anomalous and is known to cause psychosis and paranoia among the staff who play it or otherwise come in contact with it. They are typically then reported either missing or dead. There is no known way to handle this game safely.

name: Avert Your Eyes
description: Link #12 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. is footage from a hiking trip in west Germany. The video quality is abhorrent for what should be a modern phone and the device itself is caked in ashes.

name: Column Dodger
description: For the 13th link in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N. is a simple dodging game. Nearby metal objects are purported to migrate by a couple inches if the game is left on for a certain duration.

name: Specimen #14
description: Yet another untitled entry in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N., it follows an unknown protagonist hounded by mysterious, eyeball-like creatures.

name: Echochrome
description: PS Plus Premium port of Echochrome for PS4/PS5.

name: Symphonia
description: Awaken an expansive musical realm in this non-violent and poetic platformer. In Symphonia, you'll use the power of your violin coupled with your platforming skills to gather an orchestra to bring the musical machinery of the world back to life.

name: Specimen 15
description: Mysterious disembodied eyes chase you in this link of Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N..
Appropriately titled 16, this C.H.A.I.N. link may or may not be linked to an incident of occult Welsh origin.

name: Vale
description: Link #17. In a unique departure from most other case reports, this one is entirely in Japanese and its subject follows an unknown protagonist in a dark forest.

name: Ringleaders
description: Trust no one in this retrofuturistic, prohibition-inspired social deduction shooter.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Miotsukushi-hen
description: An expanded version of Miotsukushi-hen with additional chapters and several changes.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Matsuribayashi-hen
description: A remake of the fourth and final arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions
description: Study, relax, or get productive in the cozy world of Spirit City. Set the mood with lofi beats and soundscapes, customize your character and spirit pet, and use the productivity tools to help you stay on task. All while discovering cute hidden spirits and adding them to your spirit collection.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Saikoroshi-hen
description: A remake of the epilogue to the main story of Higurashi originally included in Rei.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kizuna: Kotohogushi-hen
description: An extra arc that functions as a prequel to the entire series.

name: Donuts
description:
You decide to take a vacation to your favorite resort.
Unfortunately, Hell had the same idea.

Donuts is a collection of levels that were made for various community projects over the years, with a few new levels thrown in specifically for this project. Every level has been given a fresh coating of OTEX. Levels pulled from previous projects have been heavily modified in one way or another.

name: Brocante Game: Blister Hunter
description: Brocante Game: Blister Hunter is a game based on the first two season of the french youtube serie Brocante Game. it's the first opus of a diptych followed by Brocante Game: Gabriel's Odyssey (2018).

name: Pachi-Slot Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri
description: Pachi-Slot Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri is a pachi-slot simulator based on Higurashi When They Cry, released in the same month as the real machine with the same name by Alchemist.

name: Toxicity
description: This is a medium challenge map with about 220 monsters on UV and an expected playtime of 20-30 m﻿inutes depending on how much you explore or die. It takes place in a fairly large and open area, but it's structured so that you are still guided along an intended path, and it's your choice to explore off that path or not.

name: Interception
description:
Interception is a vanilla-compatible megawad for DOOM II.
In the far distant future, you are part of a team of marines who are sent a distress signal from an archaeology site. Once you arrive, the rest of your team is killed by some nasty hell spawns. Now it's your job to stop the invasion, or die trying. Along the way, you explore ancient military bases, an underground necropolis, and Hell itself.

name: Interception II
description:
Destroy demons in 31 action-packed levels; Interception II is here.
This is a Doom II community megawad spanning three episodes with a secret level included.

name: Intergalactic
description: Destroy Asteroids and Ships, Explore Space!

name: DollHouse: Survive or Death
description: "for that child's future." "I must ...... I must to do this. The eight children who came to the mansion were waiting for a series of horrible dreams... A series of horrible nightmares... Who did this? and for what? And who did this for whom...? Only by entering the DollHouse can we find out.

name: Idle Transport Tycoon
description: Build platforms to transport people, increase your customer population by buying and merging houses. Advance through levels.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 10: Johnny
description: This allows the character "Johnny" to be used in-game.

name: Disciples of Varahces
description: Disciples of Varahces is a roguelike where you fight waves of increasingly stronger enemies, gathering items along the way to grow stronger yourself.

name: Meer's: Escape
description: Meer's: Escape is an island version of the classic city simulation. The game expands on some of the deep-rooted tropes of the city-building experience while introducing new gameplay elements to recognize the excitement and challenges of creating and maintaining a real city.

name: NPC Ville: The Story of the Blacksmith
description: You're an NPC and the success of the game you live inside depends on you! As Aimee the blacksmith, it's up to you to give quests, craft weapons, make sales, assist with dangerous combat, and decorate the town as you work to keep the game—and your home—alive.

name: Machines of Madness
description: In a future where time manipulation has become a reality. As an elite operative armed with cutting-edge technology, you must navigate through waves of adversaries in a bid to unravel the truth. But here's the twist: death is not the end.

name: The Riftbreaker: Heart of the Swamp
description: Explore an entirely new area of Galatea 37 in this Story Campaign expansion for The Riftbreaker. Catalog new species. Craft new and unique weapons. Fight hordes of aliens, unlike anything you've seen before.

name: LumineNight
description: 'LumineNight' is a mystery adventure game set in the city of Summerset, USA, in the 1950s. It involves detective Kelvin Foster and his only daughter, self-proclaimed detective Selen Foster, unraveling the secrets of a series of unresolved murders over a decade.

name: Clue/Cluedo: Tropical Pack
description: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: The Devilry Reservation: Сhapter II
description: The second chapter of The Devilry Reservation: Behind the Shadow - Shadow. Immerse yourself in the internal affairs of the Paranormal Security Service. Be ready to see the other side of the interaction of evil spirits with our world. How people side by side with them hold the two worlds in harmony.

name: Aery: Calm Mind 4
description: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself in beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Zakantosh Cardgame
description: A Collectible Single Player Card Battle Game that focuses on Story Content. Your enemies are all kind of creatures, goaded by the evil influence of the mysterious crystals, that appeared out of nowhere. You will need to collect powerful cards and gems to fight your way through Zakantosh.

name: Last Command: Scream Fest pack
description: Free download DLC for the Scream Fest. Become an assassin of Halloween, sneak into the program world and find out the hidden secret.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Halloween Skin Pack
description: This collection of 10 spooky paint jobs is not for the faint of heart. Spread the spirit of Halloween across Angel Shores and Seaside Valley wherever you drive.

name: Cosmotroid
description: Escape from the asteroid X-474 which has been invaded by aliens. Take your weapons and destroy every enemy who tries to stop you in this amazing arcade style third person shooter game full of action, creatures and explosions.

name: Dark Astral
description: Dark Astral is a 2D action-adventure platform game with fast-paced combat, world exploration, multiple levels, and addictive gameplay set in an underworld filled with demons and all sorts of creatures.

name: Kinduo 2: Frostbite
description: Kinduo 2 is a local co-op game where two elemental friends with unique abilities need to help each other to overcome obstacles! Create blocks of ice, burn or melt things, and combine your skills to create plants!

name: Parry King
description: An action game to master the parry. No search, no death penalty, and a boss rush to train your skills!

name: Taking Root
description: Taking Root is a cosy game about caring for houseplants and watching them thrive. Care for your houseplants in real time in this realistic simulation game and create your own urban jungle.

name: Space Dezinsector
description: Make your way through crowds of alien bugs using surrounding objects. Clear out the rubble and overcome the obstacles. Move through the corridors of the abandoned space station where you find yourself against your will.

name: Boundary: Elite Cosmetic Bundle Founders Pack
description:
This Elite Cosmetic Bundle Founders Pack contains exclusive items.
In dedication to those who engineered and built the Space Elevator, allowing Low Earth Orbit travel a reality. The Engineer Pack for Astroperator Fort contains an unique look specific to her.

name: Mad Experiments 2: Premium Pack
description: Dive into the world of Mad Experiments with 3 exclusive masks to wear during your adventures, as well as the original files of the soundtracks!

name: American Truck Simulator: Dragon Truck Design Pack
description: Customize your truck with a unique set of tuning options:Unique Dragon paint jobsDragon Design wheel rimsDragon Design metal steering wheel

name: Animalia Survival: Haloween Pack
description: The Haloween Pack

name: School Booster
description: In the School Booster, you will play the role of being a parent raising your girl to an adult (18). her grow-up journey will come from heaven, baby, kid, teenager, these four sages. And each stage has slightly different playing mechanics.

name: Political Mastery
description: Have you ever been angry with a politician? Have you ever said to yourselves that you would have done better if you were in their shoes? Political Mastery gives you the opportunity to take on this role. Prove yourself and become the best politician you can be.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Legends Pack
description: Featuring two exclusive in-game timeless Dakar vehicles to make you return to the old days: Jan De Roy's DAF 95 X1 TurboTwin and Ari Vatanen's Peugeot 405 Turbo 16 raced to history in 1988 and now both vehicles can be yours.

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - John Force Racing Pack
description: John Force is a legend in the sport and this pack puts you in the driver's seat with Team Force to further build on this formidable legacy.

name: Redline Racing
description: High Pace, High Skill Time-trial Racing Game

name: World of Rune
description: World of Rune is an MMORPG game with tons of different characters and mystical cute pets. You can play as a Swordsman, Mage, Archer and Cleric.

name: Skyline Sprinters
description: Welcome to an adrenaline-pumping platform game where players embark on an exhilarating race against each other through a challenging parkour course! Prepare to test your agility, speed, and reflexes as you navigate through an immersive world filled with obstacles, traps, and exciting surprises.

name: Catniptic
description: In Catniptic, you take on the role of a dynamic feline protagonist navigating through various dream worlds, unlocking eccentric abilities with magical catnip, and reclaiming stolen furniture. This psychedelic platformer never plays the same twice.

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Electro Blitz Pack
description: Featuring eye-catching neon circuitry laid-to-black, the Electro Blitz Pack is loaded with a Top Fuel Car, a Driver's Suit, a Parachute, and a Vehicle-Hauler each with a design sure to be noticed.

name: Century: Skaarp Pack
description: Foolish are those who defy the legendary dragon guardian Venfir, for their shall soon taste the mystical blade of the ethereal Skaarp of Halgyn and his thousand years old army.

name: Tale of Two Cranes
description: Fulfill your epic destiny in mythic ancient China! Lead armies, wield magic, and put an emperor on the throne - or become the emperor yourself!

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 6
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Sweet Gods Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 3 legendary Sweet Gods: the mysterious Sweet Creator, Sweet Maker (Saki), and Sweet Blogger (Natsumi), as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: Greed is Good
description: In Greed is Good, a PvPvE game, you will enter the mysterious dungeon as a Bounty Hunter. In the game, you need to cooperate with your teammates to fight against enemies and fears. Be aware of the toxic gas and be sure to escape before you are drown out.

name: Rezzil Player: Adidas Brand Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the first official Brand Pack from Adidas. Play in the colossal Adidas Stadium and pick from a selection of soccer balls from playground bangers to world cup classics. Equip from your locker and use in any soccer and football games.

name: Dead Alone
description: Dead Alone is an intense first-person survival shooter set in a dangerous apocalyptic cityscape. In this desolate landscape, your precision in shooting and meticulous resource management will be the key to survival.

name: Hot Wheels: Beefed Up Pack
description: Power up your collection with two all-strength vehicles. HW Armored Truck will resist every attack and secure your victory! And Baja Bone Shaker will be a tough nut to crack for everyone. Anyone who thinks of beating them is just off track!

name: Super Galaxy Ball: Skin Pack 1
description: Skin Pack # 1 for Super Galaxy Ball

name: Pixel Royale 3D
description: Dive into Pixel Royale 3D, a pixelated FPS with 40+ weapons, intense gameplay, and customizable character skins. Engage in thrilling gunfights across 3 maps, and challenge opponents in 3 different game modes. Gear up and lock and load for the ultimate Pixelated FPS experience!

name: Ragdoll Combat
description: 3D ragdoll fighting game with local multiplayer support with a growing number of characters and weapons to be added though various different updates. Powered by Unreal Engine 5

name: Crisis Control
description: Crisis Control is a strategy game where you and up to 3 friends command firefighters, medics, police officers and technicans to protect a small, rapidly growing village from natural but also human-made desasters.

name: Planet Zoo: Twilight Pack
description: Creep into the mysterious world of crepuscular animals with the Planet Zoo: Twilight Pack! It features five incredible new species, 200+ detailed new scenery pieces, and the first new career scenario since Planet Zoo launched

name: Rezzil Player: Rovers Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official Blackburn Rovers FC Team Pack. Pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this historic club.

name: Z.O.N.A: Origin
description: Z.O.N.A: Origin is more than a game; it's your deep dive into a post-apocalyptic world. Here, every choice matters. Engage with a varied, enthralling open world, a suspenseful storyline, perilous anomalies, and potent artifacts in this thrilling game.

name: Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy
description: Welcome to "Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy", a captivating 3D cooking adventure set in the heart of the old North. Assume the role of a Viking Chef and dive headfirst into the culinary chaos of a bustling Norse kitchen. Your mission? To serve the gods a feast of legendary proportions.

name: Starship Scramble
description: Play an arena shooter roguelite where you build your own ship and survive through enemies' attack. You can even customize individual weapons, turning each one into a unique and formidable tool of destruction.

name: Lost Alien
description: Lost Alien is a 2D pixel game that combines elements of platformer, puzzles and planetary exploration. Move through the levels passing various obstacles, dodging enemies, use the jetpack.

name: Just Cause 4: Neon Racer Pack
description: Grab the Neon Racer Pack and receive the modified Neon Racer Supercar, plus the Neon Racer Wingsuit and Neon Racer Parachute.

name: The Cursed Village TD
description: The Cursed Village is a rogue-lite Tower Defense game. With six types of towers, dozens of enemies, dozens of abilities and a unique rune system, you will strategize and defend your village against an ancient curse.

name: Homefront: The Revolution - The Liberty Pack
description: The Liberty pack features two pieces of rare combat gear unlocked and ready to personalize your Co-Op character with - the Liberty Body Armour and KPA Shock Trooper Helmet.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 2
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Wild Terra 2: New Lands - Bard Pack
description: Bard Pack for Wild Terra 2

name: Wavecade: Ships Pack
description: Play Wavecade with a selection of 10 NEW ships! Customize your player with any color and show off your skills... in style!

name: West Hunt: Halloween Pack
description: Halloween DLC with scary Sheriff's monsters and more stuff

name: Dragon Wings
description: Embark on an epic journey of self discovery! Set out on a thrilling adventure through treacherous landscapes and overcome exciting challenges. Will you be able to find your way home?

name: Fishing Planet: Topwater Kayak Pack
description: Tired of sitting with a fishing rod on the shore? Then Topwater Kayak Pack is what you need! It contains not only spinning and casting rods, powerful reels, wobblers, frogs, and many other surface lures, but also a branded kayak that will allow you to fish literally anywhere on the waterway!

name: Payday 2: McShay Mod Pack
description: McShay Mod Pack is available on its own or as part of the Hostile Takeover Bundle.

name: War of Wheels
description: War of Wheels is a frenetic car fighting game in an original “medievalpunk” setting. Choose your car, inspired by a fantasy class, and get ready for battle! Play the single player campaign in the world of Zeranthia or challenge your friends in the numerous multiplayer modes. Fight!

name: Isle of the Jötunn
description: You are the sole survivor of a terrible shipwreck. The isle is rich with the resources to keep you alive but, it seems there is another inhabitant. A Jotun of fearsome strength has lived here for ages and doesn't enjoy visitors.

name: From the Deep
description: A warrior finds himself on the darkest of the dungeons. He does not know how or why he came to be there. He does not know how to get out of it. To conquer his freedom, he will have his fears challenged, his will tested, and his courage tried.

name: Faded Stories: Full Moon
description: Unburied and forgotten undead gather in the city center, while the citizens of Greenberg go about their day-to-day lives.

name: Float
description: A aimless rafting trip, anything possible will be your boat. Tiny boats will be swallowed by fast-flowing rivers, but mighty boats will stand firm. When encountering danger, do you choose to avoid it or bravely overcome it? Use your ingenuity to make this journey go further!

name: What the Hell
description: ﻿What the Hell is a rogue-lite top-down shooter. A terrifying future awaits the modern world under the influence of demon lords. Choose varied features to create your own skill set and determine your gameplay style. Collect demon's souls and never stop until you become stronger than they are.

name: Planet Zoo: Grasslands Animal Pack
description: Discover spectacular new species of the grasslands with the Planet Zoo: Grasslands Animal Pack, featuring eight diverse animals who all reside in natural steppes, plains and prairies across the world!

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 5
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: The First Explorers
description: The First Explorers is a Settlers-like game, that offers the perfect mix of organic city-building and RTS in a bustling world. Set in the time of antiquity in Europe, you will play as the Romans, Carthaginians or Gauls. Are you ready to raise an army backed by a thriving economy?

name: Lunar Ascendant
description: In Lunar Ascendant, a narrative-driven political simulation RPG, you lead Artemis, humanity's first lunar colony. You have to confront different factions in their struggle for power, and address the controversial use of human brains as CPUs. Your choices will shape the future of space colonization.

name: Arcane Arena
description: Arcane Arena is an intense multiplayer action game chosen from diverse spellcasting classes, each with unique abilities. Engage in team-based combat, and dominate the battlefield. Unleash devastating spells, manipulate time, summon creatures, and harness elements to emerge victorious.

name: The Leverage Game
description: You can learn realistic, world-class management techniques! The Leverage Game is an updated online version of “Leverage: The Game of Business,” an authentic business board game developed by ActionCoach 20 years ago.

name: Watch Dogs 2: Psychedelic Pack
description: Embrace the San Francisco psychedelic vibe! With this full set of customization, give Marcus the funkiest look: outfit, weapon, drone and car, let all them colour and brighten your day.

name: School Cafeteria Simulator
description: Manage your own Indonesian school cafeteria in this simple first-person simulation game!

name: Touhou Dungeon Maker: The Labyrinth of Heart
description: Touhou Dungeon Maker is a roguelike x tower defense style dungeon management RPG. Strengthen characters, place multiple traps and facilities, and keep fighting off massive numbers of incoming phantoms. It's time to unravel the mysteries of the magical dungeon!

name: Baker Business 3: Halloween Pack
description: Invoke the Halloween spirit and invite autumn into your bakery. Bake spooky recipes, decorate your bakery for the season, hand out candy to your customers and spend tickets in the Halloween shop!

name: Sword Drift
description: Fly with your sword, roam the martial arts world!

name: Crowd
description: Explore the depths of the pipes that once held better worlds, learn the life stories that are about to vanish in a world sinking in lies and conflicts. The tyranny rises in times of weakness.

name: Dui
description: Help Dui find his way home in this challenging puzzle-adventure. Fight bosses, discover new abilities, and learn more about this quirky character on your journey home.

name: The Police Interceptors Simulator: War Against Racers
description: You will become part of an elite police squad. Your mission is to engage in battles with unpredictable street racers who pose a danger to ordinary citizens on the roads. You will have to control various police vehicles and use your skills and tactics to apprehend and stop these dangerous offenders.

name: Omega Tower
description: Omega Tower is a small tower defense game mixed with rogue-lite elements! Pick a loadout with unique abilities, Upgrades for your towers, and create unique synergies. But most importantly, try to defend your core!

name: Inumeda
description: Inumeda is the most nostalgic yet refreshing form of Turn Based RPG. For many, this experience will become an "intriguing mystery." Gather animal companions, Defeat enemies with skills triggered by their combinations, And explore this peculiar world.

name: Last Barrier
description: Last Barrier is a tower defense game set in a zombie apocalypse setting. Defend the base with army machine guns, rocket launchers and a wall built around the perimeter. Purchase unit upgrades with kill points. Your military base is the last line of defense against the countless forces of zombies.

name: Chocolate Kiss
description: Chocolate Kiss is a dating sim visual novel game featuring a high school student as a protagonist. The game's story starts in January, and this year, he is determined to find a girlfriend that will give him a chocolate for Valentine's Day, however he has only one month time to achieve that goal.
