The game's story advances through the days, and allows the player to go to different locations. Depending where he goes he will run into a different girl, all of which are potential candidates for becoming his girlfriend.

name: Geometric Paradox TD
description: Geometric Paradox TD - a fast paced tower defense with minimalistic graphics but complex mechanics. Build towers, choose the correct upgrades, think fast and defeat those nasty shapes! Are you ready to use your strategic and creative thinking to stop the paradox?

name: Rat it!
description: Rat It is a single-player magic shooter game in VR. As the alchemist, you must wield your powerful slingshot eradicate all the evil monsters on a medieval sailing ship.

name: Blobby's Quest
description: A simple, singleplayer 2D Platformer

name: Wildlife Wildfire
description: As Fleet Admiral, Your mission is to unite the animal factions against a cosmic threat! Wildlife Wildfire is a tactics game which adds innovative mechanics and seamless cross-platform play for you and your friends to enjoy on PC, Handheld and Mixed Reality!

name: Mr. Buttman's Grand Opening
description: Mr. Buttman was born with a fully functioning butt on his head. In fact, breathes through the butt, to the disgust of everyone around him. Despite his chronic bad breath, he's trying to start up his restaurant. His restaurant's grand opening is very soon. There's no time to waste!

name: Glitchers: Hack 'em Up
description: Fight and Hack enemies in this casual beat ‘em up fantasy game with a puzzle twist.

name: We Got Compagnie!
description: Ready your bow, tune your magical violin, and liberate the musical prodigies mangled by a Corrupted Melody by playing your own melody. Prepare yourself, 'cause We Got Compagnie!

name: PolyCity Stories: The Affair
description: The first short story from PolyCity. A point and click adventure delving into the dark and dirty polygonated corners of the City of angles... mostly right angles. The Affair follows a soft boiled/over easy private detective as he unpicks an organised crime syndicate operating across the city.

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Bossplay Costume Pack
description: Dress up your crew with this set of six outfits inspired by the bosses of Hi-Fi RUSH! Being bad never felt (or looked) so good

name: House Party: New Content Pack
description: Expand the party with fresh clothing items, a short new storyline, and two new characters from the minds of the Eek! Games team. New clothes will be wearable on all NPCs, you can enjoy a themed side-story separate from the Original Story, and one male and one new female NPC will join the party!

name: Super House of Dead Ninjas: True Ninja Pack
description: Now you can play as the fearsome One-Armed Ninja from the original House of Dead Ninjas, try your hand at the all new super hard "Ninja" Difficulty, AND refine your weapon skills with the dreaded Hookshot. Can you handle all this ninja goodness?

name: Sniper Elite 5: Concealed Target Weapon and Skin Pack
description: Hunt the enemy and strike from the shadows with an expanded cache of camouflage gear and a stealthy pistol at your side.

name: Rezzil Player: Forest Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official Nottingham Forest FC Team Pack. Pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this historic club.

name: Goblin Daily Life
description: Goblin Daily Life - 3D walking game with elements of time management and survival. You have to perform the routine work of a usual goblin, whose duties include maintaining order in the forest. Have time to feed the animals, harvest, heat the house and many others tasks.

name: Paper Flight: Relic Hunter
description: Paper Flight – Relic Hunter is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. Jump into the role of a little paper plane and rescue the world from evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Narco Wars
description: The classic drug economy game is back! You're a dealer in 1990s New York with one goal: get as rich as possible in one month. Cocaine, LSD, weed, whatever's hot. Buy low and sell high for huge profits. Stay on top of market trends with your beeper. Run from the cops... or just gun them all down.

name: Kuuruu Kenmonroku
description: A RPG in which a child of divine education travels around the world. Travel the world and expand your horizons with many unique friends.

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni: Chapter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: God's Miniature Garden
description: "God's Miniature Garden" is a horror game where you can freely explore a residential area at night, both indoors and outdoors, and aim to capture each location. Find out what the heck is going on in this area!

name: The Broken Moon
description: The Broken Moon Execution is a text-based fast-passing supernatural puzzle game. Game play is diverse, players need to explore through the map, collect various clues to solve the mystery, and gradually understand the truth of the collapse of "Samle" ......

name: Shizumeru Rakuen
description: Follow the girls' "last day" and unravel the truth

name: Kannagi Usagi
description:
Sword fight action dedicated to boss battles.
Win the battle by dominating sword to sword clashes.

name: The Sailor’s Guide to Game Design
description: The Sailor’s Guide to Game Design is an interactive visual novel try to use a 'Dialect' narrative style in games, Writing from the Margins.

name: Dragon Fantasy
description: A turn based RPG game! Players will use the traditional RPG game mode to play two major scripts and three additional content. Players will follow the plot to encounter various events, defeat various bosses, explore different worlds, and welcome friends who love traditional RPGs to play!

name: TouhouSnowClash
description: Want to compete with your friends? TouHou Snowman Clash (THSC) provides a simple environment for three players to play tricks together! Compete who can assemble a cooler snowman, and don't forget to scare your friends.

name: Numerology of Artifacts
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Horde Dominator
description: You need to immediately use various crazy weapons with your companions to kill more and more zombies, establish defense, and eventually the zombies will surge in like a tide

name: Yaz
description: Sword'n'sandal tops-down hack'n'slash-em-up

name: WWE 2K23: Steiner Row Pack
description: Get ready to hit that Frankensteiner with the Steiner Row Pack in WWE 2K23. Featuring the franchise debut of The Steiner Bros, along with Hit Row, which includes Top Dolla, Ashante Adonis, and B-Fab as the group’s manager. The Steiner Row Pack is already included in the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: WWE 2K23: Bad Bunny Bonus Pack
description: The Bad Bunny Bonus Pack features global music phenom Bad Bunny as a playable character, and a ruby-tier MyFaction card for WWE 2K23. The Bad Bunny Bonus Pack is already included as part of the WWE 2K23 Deluxe and Icon Editions.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Daemons of Khorne
description: The warp-fuelled manifestations of rage and violence are the latest playable faction in Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector. Eight murderous units, including the dreaded Daemon Prince, are available to bring Chaos to the galaxy.

name: Unloop
description: Unloop is an elegant, relaxing puzzle game about using clever mechanics to connect and remove portals.

name: Underwater World: DLC Pack
description: The DLC Pack is an extension to Underwater World - Idle Desktop Colony Building Simulator. Includes additional content.

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida
description: Unleash your inner angler in Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida DLC! Sail to Dry Tortugas, snag Black sea bass, Tarpon, and more on your own boat. Adventure awaits!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Florida
description: Unleash your inner angler in Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Florida DLC! Sail to Dry Tortugas, snag Black sea bass, Tarpon, and more on your own boat. Adventure awaits!

name: Tyrant's Twilight
description: In a fantasy world where the chosen one is dead, forge a new hope for humanity. Command allies across the battlefield in turn-based tactical gameplay, but be prepared to get your hands dirty in over-the-shoulder combat as you slash, shoot, pierce and cast spells at your foes in real time action.

name: Traffic Tour
description: Chill and simple car driving game.

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Tech Jet Supporters Pack
description: Level up your look and prepare to tear up the fairways with the legendary Tech Jet Supporters Pack.

name: Tune My Car: Tuning Studio & Car Mechanic Simulator 2023
description: "Tune My Car - Tuning Studio & Car Mechanic Simulator 2023" is an exciting game where you become a master of car tuning. Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of automotive customization and unleash your creative energy by transforming ordinary cars into unique works of art on wheels.

name: TS Marketplace: Lake Constance Scenario Pack
description: Return to the picturesque "Seelinie” and take in the views, with some brand-new scenarios for the Lake Constance route from Rivet Games.

name: TS Marketplace: FahrBar Charity Coach Pack
description: Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBar coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!

name: Trainz Plus DLC: Blue Comet 2.0 - The Seashore's Finest Train
description: Jump aboard the famous Blue Comet passenger train, hauled by the CNJ's powerful G3s pacifics in blue or black liveries, or the later weathered version as the P47 class. The package features the Baldwin G3s pacific locomotive, in both blue and clean and dirty black liveries, and a custom cab view.

name: Trainz 22: Platinum Edition Features
description: Trainz 22 Platinum Edition includes Surveyor 2.0 (new world building tools) and all 6 routes from Trainz 22 plus 5 additional routes and 21 locomotives!

name: Trainz 2022 DLC: Blue Comet 2.0 - The Seashore's Finest Train
description: Jump aboard the famous Blue Comet passenger train, hauled by the CNJ's powerful G3s pacifics in blue or black liveries, or the later weathered version as the P47 class. The package features the Baldwin G3s pacific locomotive, in both blue and clean and dirty black liveries, and a custom cab view.

name: The Leverage Game: Business Edition
description: You can learn realistic, world-class management techniques! The Leverage Game is an updated online version of “Leverage: The Game of Business,” an authentic business board game developed by ActionCoach 20 years ago.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Assorted Sidearms Pack
description: Add three versatile handguns to your hunting arsenal with the Assorted Sidearms Pack.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - New England Scout Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapon collection with these unique cosmetics inspired by the New England Mountains hunting reserve.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - New England Veteran Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by the New England Mountains Reserve.

name: The Demon's Lust
description: A nun trapped in a mansion full of lust.

name: The Demon King takes Revenge! Card Battle!!
description: Card battle game! The story is about the main character, the weakest Demon King, who battles rival magical girls, angels, and the Demon King of Hell, and grows up trying to subdue them. If you win, you can acquire your opponent's cards and incorporate them into your own deck.

name: The Clubies
description: The Clubies is a party platformer where players navigate cute cube characters through the disco to reach the dancefloor! Encounter various hazards, puzzles, and shortcuts in a fun, colorful environment as you master user-built levels together.

name: Sweet Nightclub
description: Sweet Nightclub is a casual card game. In this game, all charming girls hope to come to this nightclub for vacation and enjoy the unique massage service. Enjoy this sweet time with them!

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 2
description: A steamy Visual Novel, set in beautiful decor. The first cuckold experience was a total blast, so Nikki takes the initiative and surprises her loving husband with another wild night - this time, by accepting a cocky bartender’s invitation to his place. Will Adam be excited by her plan?

name: ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival
description: Survive the undead onslaught! Customize your katana, team up or go solo. Hack through zombies, master combat, and dominate the leaderboards in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Teddy Roosevelt Persona Pack
description: The Teddy Roosevelt Persona Pack is available exclusively to owners of the New Frontier Pass and features “Rough Rider Teddy” with a new leader model and background, new gameplay bonuses, and an updated agenda that reflect the changes to his personality. Rough Rider Teddy excels at keeping the peace on his home continent.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Catherine de Medici Persona Pack
description: The Catherine de Medici Persona Pack is available exclusively to owners of the New Frontier Pass and features “Magnificence Catherine” with a new leader model and background, new gameplay bonuses, and an updated agenda that reflect the changes to her personality.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Luminous & Darkness Pack
description: Meet 「Luminous & Darkness」: The DLC which consists of winning songs from the composition contest 'Sixtar Planet'! This DLC contains 8 new songs and a new original theme.

name: Street Stallion: The Jaywalk Simulator
description: Jaywalk Simulator! Take control of the Street Stallion, who must dodge incoming Obstacles and jaywalk himself to be finally united with a herd of horses. Test your reflexes with its challenging gameplay. Can you beat the game and become the ultimate jaywalking champion?

name: Soul War
description: Immerse yourself in a dark, epic war between the Legion of Agony and the Infernal Guardians, where the quest for the mysterious Soul Stone tears apart the realms. Choose your side and get ready for an unforgiving battle to establish your dominance over a world in turmoil.

name: Sex Bar Simulator
description: Stunning ladies want more than just a drink - they want an experience. Listen close, mix to their desires, and dazzle them with your shaking skills to get an intimate feedback from your beautiful clients.

name: Rise of the Overseer
description: Rise of the Overseer introduces the morally and ethically bankrupt AI controller, The Overseer, whose natural attitude to game Participants is occasional threats of vaporisation. This sokoban/multiban adventure puzzle game is set in science fiction world of the Overseer Corporation Gaming Centre.

name: Rezzil Player: Wolves Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official Wolves FC Team Pack. Play Heading Drills in the Molineux Stadium and pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this epic club.

name: Rezzil Player: TAE Brand Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official TAE brand pack. Play Heading Drills in the TAE training centre, and pick from a selection of exclusive kit from one of the world's hottest brands.

name: Rezzil Player: Man City FC Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the Official Manchester City FC Pack. Pick from a selection of kit from branded gloves to exclusive soccer balls. To top it off, experience heading drills in the mighty Etihad Stadium!

name: Red Dust
description: Red Dust is a space-colony simulation game. Build the future of humanity in the unforgiving Mars environment. Explore, exploit resources, build, research, manage the complexity of a self sufficient base, optimize, automate, expand, conquer, but most important of all... survive.

name: ProxOS
description: Step into a time portal to 1993. While your friends are battling it out in the latest FPS adventures, you got the opportunity to learn the newest trend, programming. Turn on your CRT monitor and learn to write code, compete with others in challenges or write minigames.

name: Puzzling Wild: DLC - 400 Extra Puzzle Pack
description: This puzzle pack has 400 extra puzzles for the game Puzzling Wild IQ Test. They offer more of a challenge to the original puzzles.

name: 123 Talk
description:
The object of 123-Talk is to talk to your child, to help teach them how to say numbers, counting, addition, subtraction, and interact with a computer. For children ages 1-4, 123-Talk will teach your child to say the the numbers 1 through 10 and how to find numbers on the keyboard. They will also learn how to sing the 123 song and how to draw with Easy Draw II.

The registered version of this game lets you play with the latest version and also include new features.

name: Arcade Archives: Bosconian
description:
"BOSCONIAN" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1981.
Take control of a space patrol fighter and take down the space pirate BOSCONIAN!
Enemy bases can be destroyed by destroying all of their turrets or by firing missiles into the center of the base, which will cause a massive explosion.
Destroy all the enemy bases in a round to clear each stage.

name: Idle Dragon Clicker: Expansion Pack 1
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Hieronymus
description: Hieronymus is a historical fantasy adventure game with combat elements. In first-person perspective, players explore atmospheric environments, encounter grotesque creatures and experience a challenging story about the complex reality of psychological disorders.

name: Farm Expert 2016: Farm Machines Pack
description: Expand your farming possibilities with 18 new machines for your farm.

name: Noble Knight
description: Noble Knight is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Kill different enemies with your powerful sword and protect the peaceful island! Climb the locations to complete the task and deal with the monsters that stand in your way, and beware of deadly traps.

name: Hentai Direct-Her
description: Taking retro to a whole new level with hentai ball reflecting action. Pick your amateur porn star, pick your difficulty and get directing that ball.

name: Little Cheese Works
description: This is a cooperative action game where you have to carry cheese to the goal without being found by cats. You can have a conversation with voice chat, but the slightest noise will wake up the cat. Let's carry the cheese quietly by breathing quietly so that the cat won't find it!

name: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising Nemesis Pack
description: Strike first with the Nemesis Pack: The Nemeses: Go to the mat with the martial arts prowess of Terry Silver, Hammer, Bo, Gabriel and Skeleton Lord in All Valley Tournament mode, Jukebox Mode: Choose your track, rock out and punish your enemies with an all-original Cobra Kai score

name: Living with an Elf: A Cozy Forest Retreat
description: One night, an elf traveler named Lucia knocks on your door seeking shelter. Now you must live with an elf in this cozy forest retreat. Gather herbs and synthesize potions by day. Deepen your bond with your new elf companion by night.

name: Aircraft War: Extra Level Pack 2
description: With this dlc pack, 5 new maps, 5 new player planes and 5 new enemy planes are added to the game. You have must to activate this dlc once using the game editor, and then lots of fun.

name: Fit Puzzle Blocks: Expansion Pack
description: This DLC adds more than 200+ puzzles to the base game.

name: Puda + The Kid
description: Embark on a captivating grid-based dungeon crawler adventure as you join Puda and The Kid on a journey through the treacherous realms of Eldo. Customize your party, create powerful weapons, and chart the unexplored territories of Eldo.

name: Animaloid Girl
description: The story of a girl who is changing from a human to a "Kemono" and watching her coming of age. This is a multi-ending "adventure game about training an Animalized girl" set in a Kemomimi x Hong Kong x cyberpunk world.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Dune: Imperium
description:
In Dune: Imperium, you'll step into the role of one of the leaders of the Great Houses of the Imperium in a struggle to control the planet Arrakis and the invaluable Spice it provides.

The game plays out in a series of ten rounds, each of which is defined by a new Conflict on the surface of the planet; some award critical resources, and some provide Victory Points that will propel you to dominance. But choose your battles wisely: spread your forces too thin, and you'll find your enemies growing too strong to oppose.

Each round, you'll draw a hand of five cards from your deck, which will get stronger over the course of the game as you acquire new cards. Each card can be played in one of two ways: To send an Agent out into the Imperium to gather resources, or to Reveal at the end of the round to purchase new powerful cards. You must maintain a careful balance to get the most of the resources available to you. How will you find your path?

As your game progresses, you'll vie for Influence with four factions of the Imperium: The Emperor, the economically powerful Spacing Guild, the mysterious Bene Gesserit, and the ferocious Fremen of the deep deserts. Earning Influence among the various groups helps you to earn the Victory Points you need...but will you compete with your rivals for their favor, or abandon alliances to pursue other opportunities?

Many strategies are at your disposal, and many paths to victory. The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.
